name: attack
description:
17th artwork from the collection of pigs
Pig is a symbol of wealth and fertility, so, I have chosen the pig to illustrate this Collection (in the first step).In this collection, I have portrayed pigs in the form of characters, each of whom is a representative of a specific stratum and a symbol of a specific concept, in order to deal with modern human life by using these symbols and concepts.
Road map: 
These art works will be performed in several twenty-part collections, Each set will be based on human behavior. In this collection, we will deal with human behaviors and needs that make him a negative and bad creature.The tips in this collection are tied to negative concepts.   
In the second twenty-part collections, we will go to good human behaviors.
Each week one collection.
